normalized: several days later――
deep inside the mountainous country exists an academy.
it is the place yukikaze, rinko and tatsurou call home.
to thwart the continous growth of the dark force's influence,the government funded a hidden village for young taimanin.
here, students hone themselves from an early ageto become full-fledged agents.
informations regarding that training programare attributed the highest level of classification,above even the self-defense force's new tank schematics.
this is gosha academy.
yukikaze, rinko and tatsurou are all three students at thisunique campus where pupils of all age strive to improve their skills.
after accomplishing their mission at the tower,the returned three are about to give their reports.
during their route to the chief instructor's office,they retain a strained look.

name: rinko
normalized: this is akiyama rinko, mizuki yukikaze and akiyama tatsurou.
we would like to give our report on the completed mission.
come in.
after rinko introduces the group,a refined voice answers from inside.

name: rinko
normalized: excuse us.
glad to see you.
a gorgeous teacher meets the group.
of course, she's not a simple teacher.
her name is asagi.
a name that makes the servants of darkness shudder,this amazon is the strongest of the taimanin andserves as their commanding officer.
she's also the team rigorous teacher,in charge of combat exercises.

name: asagi
normalized: i'll just read your written report.
the group stiffens at asagi's words.

name: asagi
normalized: i've picked you to be the sole members of the next operation.

name: rinko
normalized: …eh?

name: yukikaze
normalized: for real?
while rinko is astonished, yukikaze's face brightens.

name: asagi
normalized: that's right.
in other words, you two are selected forthe matoi mission.
yukikaze, rinko, congratulations.

name: rinko&yukikaze
normalized: 「yes!
thank you very much!
both bow in unison.

name: yukikaze
normalized: ah, but us two?
that'd mean just me and rinko.

name: rinko
normalized: asagi-sensei, what about tatsurou?
asagi looks at the transparent tatsurou.

name: asagi
normalized: tatsurou, unfortunately you didn't make the cut this time.
however, you'll be assigned to the reserve group.

name: tatsurou
normalized: as i thought…it can't be helped since i didn't get to do anything.

name: asagi
normalized: do not feel disappointed.
the mission this time is suited for kunoichi.

name: tatsurou
normalized: suited for kunoichi?
tatsurou answers back.

name: asagi
normalized: never mind that.
right now i'll need to talk to those twoabout the mission.
tatsurou, you're dismissed.
asagi talks like the classroom is in session.

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh?
y-yes!
then, excuse me!
tatsurou bows and leaves the room.
with her childhood friend relegated to a backup position,yukikaze seems to experience mixed feelings.

name: asagi
normalized: now then, rinko, yukikaze, we need to talk.
while asagi turns towards the two, a gentle, but pained expressioncan be read on her visage, almost as a warning before her speech.

name: asagi
normalized: you two were chosen for the sheathed mission.
therefore, what follows is my personal view on that matter.

name: asagi
normalized: as you were told yesterday,the sheathed operation will prove itself to be extremely harsh.
you understand, right?

name: yukikaze
normalized: y-yes.

name: rinko
normalized: we understand that, asagi-sensei.
even though they are witnessing their strict teacher's gentle facefor the first time, it only makes the two more apprehensive.
sheathed mission" is taimanin jargon,designating an undercover investigationrequiring the agents to radically alter their identities.

name: asagi
normalized: your infiltration target is the undergroud city of yomihara.
neither the governement nor our own influence reaches that place.
it is japan's closest-to-hell red-light district.

name: asagi
normalized: i once snuck into a lawless place called the "tokyo kingdom",but yomihara is even more dangerous.
the whole town is directly under hell's dominion.

name: rinko&yukikaze
normalized: 「we understand.
ignoring their combined answer, asagi continues.

name: asagi
normalized: there are only two kinds of women in yomihara:the slaves and the prostitutes.
you two will be masquerading as the latter.

name: rinko&yukikaze
normalized: 「we are ready.
they answer together again.
even though asagi's words could cause them to lose heart and give up,their expressions become even more inflexible.
for asagi, the two taimanin are still too inexperienced.
after staring at them for a while, she lets out a sigh.

name: asagi
normalized: we have many female agents trained in that field.
it's still not too late.
how about turning down this mission?
she says it clearly.

name: yukikaze
normalized: we would like to express our gratitude for your concern, asagi-sensei.
however, i believe i am the most suited for this mission.
i'm sure you can agree with that, asagi-sensei.

name: rinko
normalized: yukikaze tends to run wild when left alone.
as her senpai, i think it's my duty to oversee her.
moreover, my ability is very useful for an emergency escape.
eyes brimming with resolve, the duo await asagi's answer.
asagi can't help but experience some griefat the unshaking determination of the pair.
however, watching her students grow into their rolesas taimanin fills her with delight.

name: asagi
normalized: all right.
i'll leave it to you.
rinko, yukikaze, work hard on the sheathed mission in yomihara.

name: rinko&yukikaze
normalized: 「thank you very much!
the two look sincerely happy.

name: asagi
normalized: right, even though it has been five years, as her daughteryou should be able to identify her without mistake, yukikaze.

name: yukikaze
normalized: yes!
of course!
their infiltration mission's goal is to rescue a particular taimanin.
she went missing during an assignment five years ago.
she is yukikaze's mother, mizuki shiranui.

name: asagi
normalized: we taimanin never abandon our comrades.
she must still be alive somewhere in that town.
retrieve her at all costs.
those are her parting words.
once outside, yukikaze and rinko reflexively look at each other.

name: yukikaze
normalized: rinko-senpai…

name: rinko
normalized: this is it, yukikaze.
rinko puts her hand on yukikaze's shoulder.

name: yukikaze
normalized: y-yes…
trembling with excitement, yukikaze nods.
actually, so does rinko.
though they displayed resolve in front of asagi,it's hard for them to hide their apprehension atthe thought of undertaking the sheathed mission.
did she notice her senpai's uneasiness?
yukikaze puts her own hand on top of rinko's.

name: yukikaze
normalized: sorry you had to get involved in this, rinko-senpai…
uncharacteristically, her tone of voice is meek.

name: rinko
normalized: what's that?
yukikaze is both a partner and a little sister to me.
as your elder, following and supporting you wherever you gois a matter of course.
those cheerful words are addressed not only to yukikazebut to herself as well.

name: yukikaze
normalized: thank you, rinko-senpai.
shaking off her worries, yukikaze smiles.

name: rinko
normalized: yeah.
say, yukikaze…
rinko suddenly lowers her voice.

name: rinko
normalized: did you speak with tatsurou about this mission?
as rinko whispers, yukikaze suddenly becomes flustered.

name: yukikaze
normalized: that's, well…err.

name: rinko
normalized: you didn't tell him?

name: yukikaze
normalized: hau…i didn't tell him.
yukikaze's face catches fire under rinko's concerned scrutiny.

name: rinko
normalized: i thought so.
are you fine with that?
wait, you can't be, right?
yukikaze, we'll be pretending to be prostitutes so――

name: yukikaze
normalized: i-i underftand!
yukikaze's stammering voice cuts rinko off.

name: yukikaze
normalized: i-i-i have, err, uuh, i have some business to take care of,so i'll take my leave!
red to the ears, yukikaze start running away through the hallway.
her destination is obvious.

name: rinko
normalized: i hope it goes well, yukikaze.
rinko mutters as she watches the back of her beloved younger sisterwho had matured into an elite taimanin.
before long, her expression becomes timid.

name: rinko
normalized: now, having said all that, what should i do myself?
having my first time taken as a prostitute by some guyi don't know…as a girl, it's bitter.
like yukikaze, rinko never laid with a man.
their innocence might be why they acceptedto pass as prostitutes for the mission in the first place.
